__e: Oh, Stan, you really know how to show a girl a good time.
Stan, did you hear what happened last night?
Stan, is this supposed to be like this?
- Oh Stan, Stan, it's the last time we'll ever talk.
Oh, honey, I know going out with Stan is big favour.
Stan, I know that makes me sound insane, I know it, but-- [INTERCOM BUZZES]
I talked only to Stan... not his very good friend... and I'm not talking to you.
As it turned out, Stan's mother wasn't so bad after all.
Now, for heaven's sake let's stop talking about people Stan doesn't know.
And, Stan, the big thing to remember now is... the Brannigans are a natural for TV.
Stan, what are you doing here?
Why, my Stan and Superman had a lot in common.
No, it's about Stan and me.
I just wanted to tell you that Stan and I are down the hall, in case you need us for anything.
